title: Video: Pacific Air â€“ Move
content:
CitR favourites Pacific Air continue their meteoric rise with a video for new single Move, taken from their forthcoming debut LP, out later this year.

When it comes to writing catchy hooks, and future stadium ready anthems, there are few bands around doing it better. Check out the gracefully shot video below, and keep your eyes peeled for Stop Talking, out 11 June.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
